short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Start Your Day With An Inspiring Proverb!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Daily Proverbs is an extension where your Chrome new tab is replaced by an encouraging and motivating verse from the Old Testament book of Proverbs of the Holy Bible everyday. A search box powered by Bing.com enables you to browse the internet right from the extension page while you seek wisdom and guidance each day.

How to get started
Click the "Add To Chrome" to install the Daily Proverbs browser extension which is integrated into Chrome to provide users access to a verse from the book of Proverbs each day along with a search bar powered by Bing.com for your convenience. The new tab extension is easy to use and user-friendly.

It does not store or share any personal information, financial details or authentication permissions.

Features
A new verse from the book of Proverbs daily on your new tab
Ease of navigation
Clean and calming user interface
Completely free to use

Permissions
It needs permission to allow new tabs to display the Daily Proverbs extension with the features including the access to customised search. This extension does NOT ask for your login or password.

By clicking "Add To Chrome", I accept and agree to install the "Daily Proverbs" extension and hereby agree to set Chrome New Tab to that provided by the service and the Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

Uninstallation:
To uninstall the extension in Chrome, go to chrome://extensions/ and locate "Daily Proverbs", click on Remove and you will be prompted with a pop up "Remove Daily Proverbs?", click the Remove button.

Disclaimer: The search bar will change to Bing.com once the extension is in use.
